9165418.extract:
Richard Ferrybridge was an English Scholastic logician of the fourteenth century.
His works include a Tractatus de veritate sive logica, and the Consequentiae. He is alluded to in The Anatomy of Melancholy.


== References ==
Ashworth, E. J. "Feribrigge, Richard". Oxford Dictionary of National Biography (online ed.). Oxford University Press. doi:10.1093/ref:odnb/53184.  (Subscription or UK public library membership required.)
